19593.name: StuDocreator
19593.description:
A small text generator for books, courses and documents.


To generate this text, simply have text fields selected and click on whichever data you want to generate.


Example: If you want to generate a Document Title, select a text field and click on the 'Title' button under the 'Documents' section.

If you want to generate a Book Author, select a text field and click on the 'Author' button under the 'Books' section.


If you would like to generate all the data of a section, for example the Title, Course and Institution of a Document, you need to have three text fields selected each named appropriately. The fields should be named by section and type, so section_type


Example. Select 3 text fields named

  1. document_title
  2. document_course
  3. document_institution

And click on the Document button in the Documents tab. This will generate all information into these text fields.

19127.name: Wantedly Preflight
19127.description:
Wantedly Preflight is a Figma plugin that validates your project satisfies the rules of the design system of Wantedly.


Features

  •  Validation ‚Äï You can check whether the node is valid just by running the plugin. The result will come out with a detailed message and you can jump into fixing it immediately with a focus button.
  •  Configurable ‚Äï Wantedly Preflight has 6+ sophisticated rule and all of them are well-tested. However, in case if you would like to opt-out of some of the rule in your project, you can independently configure items to enable.
  •  Ignore ‚Äï Exceptions are always there. On the result page, you have a check button to ignore the specific node. After you ignored a node, it will always be considered appropriate regardless of whether it violates our rules or not.


Our Design System

See Wantedly UI Components

22020.name: No Numbers
22020.description:
Get rid of default numbers in layer names. Why keep Rectangle 164 if it's just a Rectangle?


How to use

Just run it from the Quick Actions or Plugin menu. The plugin will remove default numbers from every layer on the page.

Alternatively, you can select some layers. The plugin will rename them and their children (if any).


How it works

It turns default layer names like Rectangle 420 or Frame 69 to simple Rectangle or Frame. It will beautify layers mess and help to keep your files clean and pretty.


The plugin won't affect any other layer names. It works with frames, groups, slices and any vector objects as well.


Problem? Idea? Kind words?

I accept feature suggestions and ideas to improve the plugin. No need to mess with locked layers? Rename on all pages at once? Useful exceptions? If you have any ideas or issues, let me know in the comments.


Or you can contact me via e-mail at nick.denq@gmail.com and Telegram.

This project is open sourced on Github.


<3
22020.release_notes: Better finish message. Even if there're no numbers already.

21028.name: MP Asset Generator
21028.description:
This plugin allows you to update the styles and logos of Marriage Pact assets to reuse your design for other colleges. Aside from creating two components and changing paint styles, this plugin will not mutate your Figma file in any way.


Colors

Your file should already have color styles with a hierarchy relatively like "[Print/Digital/Text] > [Primary/Secondary]". If not, clicking any colored square should initialize them with the appropriate brand colors.


Logo

When clicking "Update Logo", the plugin looks for the group "Logos/Editable Digital Logo" on the first page and creates (or updates) the components "Digital Logo" and "Print Logo", which are scalable copies of whatever lies in Editable Digital Logo.


If your file doesn't have any such component, "Update Logo" will display an error in the plugin, and no action will be taken.


---

If you have any questions, feel free to contact jerryh2@stanford.edu.

20512.name: Localiser
20512.description:
Localiser gives you the ability to translate the text elements to another one by importing the translations from google sheets. 


You can export all the text elements from current page to a csv file. 

Use the spreadsheet link to import the spreadsheet data to your plugin, which then displays the available languages. (Languages added in the sheet will be picked up. Check the example of sheet below)

On selecting the language, the text elements will change to the new text provided in the sheet. 


What your google sheet should contain:

  1. id's of the text elements of the figma page. (Column 1)
  2. Current language text. (Column 2)
  3. New language converted text. (Rest of the Columns)

21599.name: Coco
21599.description:
Your Handy Color CoWorker


Get Access to thousands of color palettes. Explore latest palette trends. Just search any color and get work-ready results or go ahead and customize one.

Discover the best handpicked collection of beautiful color gradients. Find your favorite one and apply it with a single Click!

Explore collection of official brand color palettes. Get inspired by Popular color selections and use them with a single click!

Check Colors contrast check and make sure you selected the right colors for your design with a simple workflow!

21540.name: NB heatmap
21540.description:
The heatmap can be drawn directly by clicking the mouse.

What is drawn is a png image with a transparent background.

21416.name: CoShuffler
21416.description:
A tool for randomly assigning colors to a selection of objects from a chosen color palette!


Usage

Quickly apply an assortment of colors to large selection of objects.

  • Create cool, complex patterns for backgrounds!
  • Make color iterations of logos, buttons, etc!
  • Mock up data visualizations without the hassle!


Instructions:

  1. Install CoShuffler by pressing the "Install" button in the top-right corner of this page.
  2. In your figma file, open the CoShuffler by right clicking on the canvas -> Plugins -> CoShuffler
  3. Set your palette: Select a group of objects which contain your desired color palette, and then click "Set colors".
  4. Select your objects: Once your palette is set, select one or more objects that you want to shuffle
  5. Start Shuffling: Click "GO!" to start shuffling between colors in your palette!


Constraints:

  • Currently, CoShuffler will ignore groups, frames, and components. If you want to shuffle objects in groups, either directly select the objects or ungroup them.
  • Image and gradient fills will be ignored.
  • If your object has multiple fills, CoShuffler will only change the top fill. It won't affect opacity settings of fills either.


This plugin was made for fun in my free time, if you want to see more of my work, check my website: ndrewgood.com


If you have any complaints, concerns, or want to share what you're making with CoShuffler, you can reach me via email or Instagram. Cheers, and happy shuffling! ü•≥

21579.name: Close plugin
21579.description:
Close any plugin like a boss.

The smallest functional plugin ever, with a single line of code.


How To Use:

  1. Open any plugin
  2. Run Close Plugin


Suggested Shortcut: ‚áß+RightClick

21605.name: Pickaxe
21605.description: Dig out patterns from production code; Pickaxe fetches visual patterns from a website and re-creates them as components in Figma.

21612.name: SVG .class export
21612.description: This plugin simply converts layer names to class and id attributes when exporting to SVG. Just add a dot before the name you want to get as a class. You can specify more than 1 class. You can also combine ID and classes. It is very convenient when you want to manage SVG via CSS and JS.

21547.name: Berrycast
21547.description:
Our mission is to make every second of your life more productive. And we believe that starts with clear communications and appropriate tools.


 To fulfill our mission, Berrycast helps you share video messages using your screen, your voice, and your face to support your message. Byebye misunderstandings! Create and share clear video messages in less time than it would take to type an email.

21293.name: @sposhe/reorder
21293.description:
Reorder a frame's children by their X or Y position (from right to left, top to bottom, etc).


To use:


  1. Select one or more frames with child nodes.
  2. Run the plugin
  3. Select a direction and press "Reorder"

21601.name: One Click SVG
21601.description:
Copy SVG source to clipboard with one click.


  • "Mono" button removes height, sets width to 100% (or remove width) and change fills to currentColor
  • "Poly" button removes height, sets width to 100% (or remove width) and makes ids unique
21601.release_notes: Added checkbox for setting width attribute to 100%
